name: Root 666
description:
The ruins are crumbling.

The forest is calling.

The mandrake roots are screaming.

Controls:

  • WASD + Mouse - walk and look around
  • 1 / 2 / 3 or Mouse Wheel - select No Weapon / Mandrake Roots / Eye Staff
  • LMB - use current weapon
  • RMB - cancel throwing Mandrake Root

Credits:

  • Jana Reinhardt (graphics, level design, sounds)
  • Friedrich Hanisch (programming)
  • Patrick Eckardt (music, sounds, additional graphics)

Created during Global Game Jam 2023
https://globalgamejam.org/2023/games/root-666-0

The level was made with bloed.
